Description_lang: Igira inflicts $s2 Shadowflame damage, knocking back players within $a1 yards and igniting three areas for torment. Players standing within an ignited area cause it to shrink, but suffer $@spellname414367 while Igira forges her next weapon.$?diff14|diff15|diff17 [Igira's finished weapon changes based on which area players fully extinguish. If no area is extinguished, Igira unleashes $@spellname419048.][]$?diff16 [Igira's finished weapons are chosen from the areas not extinguished, then dual wields them to combine their attacks. If no area is extinguished, Igira unleashes $@spellname419048.][]While forging a weapon, each of Igira's hammer strikes launches $@spellname423715.
